sentences.sentence: Ukraine prepares for winter as Moscow accuses Kiev of launching 27 drones in an overnight attack on Western Russia.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: As episodes of acute water scarcity become ever more frequent across the world, what does this mean for Europe?

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: At the Rafah border crossing with Egypt, these families with international passports are desperate to get out of Gaza and reach safety.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: But for now it's closed.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: Egypt says airstrikes by Israel near the crossing make it too dangerous to open, and truckloads of humanitarian aid remain backed up on the Egyptian side. يعني ليه بضحكوا على العالم وبقولوا كذا وكذا وكذا وما فيه على الأقل يساعدوا الناس تطلع يطلعوا بها إحنا مش شردين من أي مكان إحنا بس بدنا نطلع جينا هون زيارة لأهلنا إلنا شهرين قامت الحرب هذا علينا ضيعونا معنا شوية فلوس طارن لا ميا ولا أكل ولا شرب ولا تليفون ولا نت ولا أي حاجة يعني واحد بعد ما شاف الوضع في غزة إيش أقولك يعني واحد بعد ما شاف الوضع في غزة ايش اقولك يعني البيوت بتتهدى وناس بتموت والحمد لله رب العالمين طلعنا منها بخير طبعا انا مسافرة وروح قلبي وعملت يعني ان شاء الله عمر ما حدده اهلنا وبيوتنا ومالنا ولبسنا وغراضنا وما تأخذني عفشنا واسازنا لكن كله بعد فيش شيء له قيمة بالانسان As the humanitarian situation worsens in Gaza, Egypt is coming under more and more pressure to open the crossing.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_15
sentences.sentence: But Cairo says it already hosts nine million refugees and it can't let in large numbers of Palestinians.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The European Commission has announced that it will triple its financial humanitarian aid to Gaza from 25 to 75 million euros.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Its president Ursula von der Leyen stressed that the Commission supports Israel's fight against Hamas after its surprise assault last week, but that it will also work to support innocent civilians in Gaza.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_09
sentences.sentence: Egypt, Turkey and the United Arab Emirates have sent supplies to be delivered to Gaza as an aid envoy is set to head to the Rafah border crossing between Egypt and the Palestinian enclave.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: Israel has completely shut off all water, electricity and fuel supplies to Gaza from its side of the border, and airstrikes have hit the Palestinian side of the Rafa border crossing forcing it to temporarily stop operating winter is approaching in Ukraine and although

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_11
sentences.sentence: fighting will slow down people will then have to endure the cold last winter millions of Ukrainians were at times left without either heat or light after Russian airstrikes hit power stations. But the state energy company says it now has enough energy to keep people and their homes warm. We are being prepared for the next winter to come. We have accumulated appropriate volume of natural gas and we have prepared necessary measures to react in emergency cases. Meanwhile, Russia's defense ministry claimed that Ukraine launched 27 drones in an overnight attack on western Russia. Officials claim that 18 drones were shot down over the Kursk region. Ukrainian officials have never acknowledged responsibility for attacks on Russian territory.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: A 6.3 magnitude earthquake has struck western Afghanistan on Sunday, just over a week after

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: previous shakes and aftershocks killed thousands of people and flattened entire villages in the same region.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_01
sentences.sentence: The U.S. Geological Survey said the latest quake's epicenter was about 34 kilometers outside Herat, the provincial capital, and eight kilometers below the Earth's surface.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: So far, one person has been reported dead and around 150 others injured, officials said, but that number may rise.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: As global temperatures continue to rise, droughts and water scarcity are no longer a rarity in Europe.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: 30 percent of the European population is already affected, with the UN focusing its World Food Day on water.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: In the coming decades, the situation is set to get worse and the agricultural industry hit hard. Some of the food products cannot be produced anymore in southern parts of Europe because it's getting too hard. People think that UK is a rainy country but actually we've been experiencing drought as well and places like this provide important agriculture for us. The world's growing population, predicted to reach 8.5 billion by 2030, and a rising middle class, are fuelling the strain.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_03
sentences.sentence: People in general, they are getting richer, and when people are getting richer, they are using more resources, not only water resources, but also land, and they eat more, they eat more, they have more variety in their diet.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: And other industries such as the energy sector are also set to be impacted.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_12
sentences.sentence: As we move into a net zero era, a clean energy era, we're moving towards things like hydropower for sure. But if we have less water in our rivers, it means that we won't be able to rely on hydropower. And actually, we're turning to coal and gas, things that we consider dirty still has to be in place if we are going to meet our energy demands.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_14
sentences.sentence: AMNA NAWAZ In 2000, Europe introduced the Water Framework Directive to protect water resources across Europe. However, there is still a long way to go.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_13
sentences.sentence: The measures that we are implementing needs to be a little bit accelerated at different scales at the local level, at the country level, at the EU level, so that the level of preparedness towards these uncertainties will also be improved.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: In 2006, Sabine was unaware that she was pregnant while using glyphosate in her line of work. Little did she know this potent herbicide would leave an indelible mark on her life. Chaque année, dans le cadre de mon travail d'organisatrice de randonnées à cheval, je devais passer un désherbant à base de glyphosate sur notre carrière d'équitation.

sentences.sentence: C'est un espace en sable d'à peu près 700 mètres carrés.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Et à chaque passage, ça me prenait plusieurs jours.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Et c'est le moment où Théo a été dans mon ventre, c'était le début de ma grossesse.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Theo was at the beginning of my pregnancy and that's when the organs, the esophagus, the trachea, were malformed at Theo's.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: In 2018, Sabine took Monsanto, the company that markets the pesticide globally, to court.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: The connection between glyphosate and Theo's malformations was recognized and the family received compensation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: A victory indeed, but one that cannot erase years of suffering. glyphosate and Theo's malformations was recognized and the family received compensation.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Le commissionnaire européen considère renouer l'autorisation de glyphosate pendant 10 ans et a voté pour le 13 octobre.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Le herbicide est détenu sans zone de concernation, selon un rapport de l'Autorité de sécurité alimentaire européenne.

And this indicates the potential of glyphosate to cause cancer. So we believe de glyphosate pour causer le cancer. Nous croyons que le glyphosate doit être classé comme carcinogène.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_02
sentences.sentence: Il y a beaucoup de études qui montrent que l'exposition du glyphosate peut être liée à l'autisme en enfant et à la maladie de Parkinson.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_16
sentences.sentence: Sabine fait maintenant une pleine impassion aux membres du Parlement européen.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Ce que je voudrais leur dire, c'est de sortir le nez des chiffres, de sortir le nez des bilans économiques et des statistiques, de se dire que derrière les statistiques, il y a réellement des victimes.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_04
sentences.sentence: Si ils prennent la décision de maintenir le glyphosate sur le marché européen, ils prennent la décision qu'il y aura ces victimes.
